channel.title: How?
channel.description:
How is this community over 80x smarter than the Jagex programmers?
If you think about it, we remake everything they make from scratch, how is that?

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

yeah, you can just delete this.

100% of people have no respect for anybody, which is why this site fucking fails.

Read full topic

[/quote]

dummied down: IF U R ON DESE FORUMS AND WANT TO KOD AN MMORPG THEN U CANT CUZ UR PROBABLY STUPID BUT IF U DO HAVE SKILLZ TO KOD AN MMORP THEN UR PROBABLY LAZY

honestly though, let this thread die already

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:13, topic:300291”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=396578.msg2946017#msg2946017 date=1252217981]

@Lawl

I mean the community, if we all worked together to make one source, we would rape Jagex.

what makes you think that? already been tried several times

Honestly, it hasn’t. I’m talking about a group of ~200 people, not 8-17

It would fail miserably, because there would be no sense of good organisation, and all contact will be done via irc/msn, when jagex makes shit they sit round a big table and discuss stuff(I assume…)

They have their little study groups (how cute):

Though, I just noticed there’s a table in that picture.

Ah, here’s a bigger table:


[/quote]
Your pics only show if you visit jagex.com and then the picture, otherwise you get a 404[/quote]

My bad- I wasn’t sure if they were going to. Fixt.

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Noobie22, post:29, topic:300291”][quote author=Newty link=topic=396578.msg2946455#msg2946455 date=1252246670]
You are becoming stupider by the post, stop well you are ahea… too late.

There is nowhere near 300,000 active user’s on this site, there never has been. There are also not 300,000 people on here that would be willing to play a private server.

Not to mention, the server that you plan on making will hold 300,000 people on only 3 different server’s? That is roughly 100,000 people per world (VPS). Runescape holds 2,000 per world, so the server we are making is infact 50x more stable then Runescape?

Please inform me, no all of us, on how you plan to accomplish such a task.

Edit: edited the stability part
[/quote]

I was not inferring to the active users.

And you got me again, but as the server grew we could allow more players on as we got VPS/Dedi upgrades from donations, etc.[/quote]
I think you mean “referring”
Also, I can tell you now [as many others have] that this will fail. And if it doesn’t fail, you’ll get sued most likely.

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

Newty:

Jagex has been running Runescape for what, 10 years now? So it has taken them almost 10 year’s to get from where they started to where they are now. They probably have around (not sure) 50-100 developers who work 8 hour day’s, 5 day’s a week.

Rsc was made by 3 people. Rs2 was made by 50. Today, There is about 130 working the job, 200 on mechscape, and the others on funorb. The rest, player support and the guy who buys the pizza and coffee.

No fuck no, non of us are as smart as them. Look, We wouldnt be able to even get some organization to start.

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

There’s about 3-5k people interested in private servers, vast majority just want to hack the shit out of each other using the old runescape client, whilst chatting.
I seriously doubt you’d even find 10 people out of all those that are here for ‘educational purposes’, who would be interested in accurately recreating runescape. If you want runescape, go play runescape.

As for the manhours that went into making the game, it’s a bit of a joke now that they are switching to platform dependant graphics, the download is near 100k and there’s little gameplay. There are alot of better games out there written in C(++) with better graphics, similar download and far better gameplay.

Still you have to thank them for sharing all their client code.

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:23, topic:300291”]Let me reiterate this for you because apparently you were to thick to understand it the first time.

Jagex has been running Runescape for what, 10 years now? So it has taken them almost 10 year’s to get from where they started to where they are now. They probably have around (not sure) 50-100 developers who work 8 hour day’s, 5 day’s a week.

So what you want to do is re-create a game that took that much manpower and that much time with a bunch of teenager’s from a Runescape cheating site without paying them or even motivating them for that matter.

Good fuckin’ luck

In hindsight of this post I see that I rambled quite a bit, I do that from time to time, but what I was trying to say was this; A game like Runescape, almost any game for that matter, takes time to develop, it take’s constant updating, constant testing, you would have to be in contact with your team members 24/7 to make sure they are working towards the right goals, along with 9999 other factor’s that have not been mentioned.

So what I am saying is; all of the above is nearly impossible over the Internet.[/quote]

True, but all of the people on here would most likely play(300k?), and people on RS would talk about it and the list would go on and on.

I know that a computer couldn’t handle 300k people, that’s why we get funds from donations and etc and just host on different ports on 3+ different VPS’/Dedicated servers.

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Let me reiterate this for you because apparently you were to thick to understand it the first time.

Jagex has been running Runescape for what, 10 years now? So it has taken them almost 10 year’s to get from where they started to where they are now. They probably have around (not sure) 50-100 developers who work 8 hour day’s, 5 day’s a week.

So what you want to do is re-create a game that took that much manpower and that much time with a bunch of teenager’s from a Runescape cheating site without paying them or even motivating them for that matter.

Good fuckin’ luck

In hindsight of this post I see that I rambled quite a bit, I do that from time to time, but what I was trying to say was this; A game like Runescape, almost any game for that matter, takes time to develop, it take’s constant updating, constant testing, you would have to be in contact with your team members 24/7 to make sure they are working towards the right goals, along with 9999 other factor’s that have not been mentioned.

So what I am saying is; all of the above is nearly impossible over the Internet.

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“Noobie22, post:18, topic:300291”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=396578.msg2946359#msg2946359 date=1252244888]
Besides that, if you make a private server that becomes popular, it will get you sued.
[/quote]

That’s why we remake everything.

It’s not going to come easily but it would work! You guys think nothing but negative and that’s why most projects end.
What we would create would be completely flawless and would be better than most of RuneScapes features.[/quote]

But then if we’re remaking everything then why not make a whole different game with a different engine, different game mode etc. ?

Read full topic
